item.description:
From 1972 to 1994, Dennis Coy worked inside banks, including serving on Loan Commitees, which gave him valuable insights into what banks look for in borrowers. In 1994, Dennis started his own business as a commercial finance broker, helping to pair up small businesses and lenders.

Some examples of common stages where Dennis has been particularly helpful to small businesses include:

  1. lines of credit for working capital, 
  2. short-term loans for expansion and growth, and
  3. small to medium businesses in general.

In his presentation, Dennis will walk through the stages of the loan process and the characteristics that banks look for in borrowers like a credit review, cash flow, and even the personal character of the borrower.

Attendees will gain insights into the stages of business growth, and will have the opportunity to ask Dennis questions after the presentation.

We look forward to seeing you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Use the 100 Milk St. entrance and take the elevator to the 8th Floor. Ring the doorbell at the glass door and someone will come let you in.
item.why: We're having Dennis Coy from Exemplar Capital come in as a guest speaker to share his 39 years of experience in securing loans for small businesses.
item.name: Special Guest Speaker, Commercial & SBA Loan Specialist!
